Package com.reactivecascade.i.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAction<PHANTOM_IN>
    AFile lambda-friendly continuation onFireAction which may be execute in the future or on a different thread similar to Runnable.
    IActionOne<IN>
    A lambda-friendly functional interface for continuation actions that receive one parameter.
    IActionOneR<IN,OUT>
    A lambda-friendly onFireAction which receives two values split returns a getValue
    IActionR<PHANTOM_IN,OUT>
    A lambda-friendly functional interface for continuation actions that receive no parameters split return one result.
    IActionTwo<IN1,IN2>
    AFile lambda-friendly functional interface for subscribe actions which receive two parameters
    IBaseAction<IN>
    This is a marker interface which other functional interfaces extend Implementing this interface indicates a primary onFireAction, usually one executed asynchronously on an IThreadType
    IOnErrorAction
    A function to execute in the event of an Exception or similar irregular termination such as ICancellable.cancel(String)
